EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong ""dry"" hailfall (""grêle sèche""), very probably from a supercell, whitened the ground. Vineyards heavily damaged in a few minutes (up to 100 %). Cars also damaged. Hailstones should have reached several cm diameter (up to 6-7 according to eyewitness).

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Roads and highways whitened by hailstones. Precise time of the hailfall peak 9h45-10h TU (based on radar). In Bayonne surroundings within a radius of a few kms, damages due to strong rain and Adour overflow. An embankment has collapsed upon a road (precise location unknown).

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hail and rain. Hailstones were rather small (""as big as marbles""), but a few had reach 2,5 cm to 3 cm (based on photo)
REFERENCE: ""Des grêlons gros comme des billes : les images du violent orage qui a touché l'Auvergne et le Limousin"", La Montagne, 16 Aug 2023.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Very strong hail and rainstorm. Whole storm lasted since 17-18h to midnight (based on paper). Hailstones diameter about 3-4 cm (""gros comme des balles de ping-pong""). No damage mentioned in the articles except a photo of a damaged veranda (see first link)
REFERENCE: ""VIDÉO. Éclairs, grêlons, inondations... : Comment la municipalité de Saint-Céré a géré l'orage qui a touché la commune en août"", La Dépeche, 18 Feb 2024. Orages dans le Lot : 150 maisons inondées et privées d'électricité à Saint-Laurent-les-Tours, gros dégâts à Saint-Céré"", La Dépeche, 15 Aug 2023.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm. Hailstone diameter probably up to 3 cm (""as a quail egg""). In Roiffé, shattered car windows, perforated slate roofs, holed gates. Crops also heavily damaged. In Saix, vineyards fully destroyed and a shed roof was torn off. No injury.
REFERENCE: ""Vienne : ""Des grêlons de la taille d'un œuf de caille"", gros dégâts matériels après un orage dans le Loudunais"", France Bleu Nouvelle Aquitaine, 04 June 2022.
""Nord Vienne : le préfet rencontre les sinistrés de la tempête de grêle"", CENTRE PRESSE, 09 JUN 2022

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Hailstones up to about 5 cm diameter (""as big as chicken eggs""). Damages to cars, 21 roofs. Slight damages to vegetation (based on photos)
REFERENCE: ""EN IMAGES. Violent orage de grêle près de Saumur en début d’après-midi"", Ouest-France, 4 June 2022.
""TÉMOIGNAGE. « C’était Hiroshima » : après le violent orage de grêle, Fontevraud attend réparation"", OUEST FRANCE, 20 JUN 2022

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Violent hailstorm in Les Fourgs, South Pontarlier at about 15h. Hailstones diameter between 3 and 4 cm (""taille d'une balle de ping pong"" according to testimonies). Cars and windows damaged. Episode lasted half an hour. Thick hail layer on mairie'square. Several little villages were hit by storm. Just after hail, rain took place and flooded several homes.
REFERENCE: ""PHOTOS - Orage de grêle aux Fourgs : les foins totalement détruits pour les agriculteurs"", FRANCE BLEU, 29 JUN 2021;

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Big hailstorm upon Nantes and Saint Nazaire. Hailstones up to 2-3-4 cm (based on photos see second link) Also strong winds, probably convective.

REFERENCE: Jeremy Sarano (on Facebook), 24 Oct 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hail. Thick hail layers in gardens and roads. No damage known.
REFERENCE: ""Violent orage de grêle au nord de Montpellier et à Lunel, presque toute la région en vigilance jaune"", Midi Libre, 23 Oct 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Thick hail layers in Lunel's surroundings (precise location unknown). Damage unknown.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Big hailstorm. Hailstones diameter up to 4 cm.
REFERENCE: Météo-Centre (on Facebook), 22 Oct 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Very strong hailstorm disturbed the arrival of Criterium du Dauphiné race. Hail layers more than 2 cm high and torrents. Some cyclists were wounded by hailstones.
REFERENCE: ""Intempéries en Isère : les images de la tempête de grêle"", France Bleu Isère, 13 Aug 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hail and windstorm. Hail layers up to 2-3 cm (based on photos)
REFERENCE: ""Vidéo. Val-d’Oise. Des bourrasques de vent et de grêle à Vauréal"", Actu.fr, 13 Aug 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm. Crops and vineyards were damaged by large hailstones. Some homes and other buildings were flooded.
REFERENCE: ""Orages : la grêle fait des dégâts dans le vignoble du Bas-Armagnac"", Média7.ma, 13 Aug 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Big hail storm. Hailstones diameter at least up to 4 cm (based on photo). Thick hail layers whitened gardens.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm in the evening. Hailstones diameter up to 4 cm (based on photo).

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Big rain and hailstorm in the evening. Streets are flooded and hailstones diameter up to 2-3 cm.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm. Hailstones diameter up to 2,5 cm (based on testimony). Heavy damages in Camping de Poinsouze. 95% of the cars were damaged with a few broken Windows. A few mobil-homes and plastic chairs also damaged by hail. In the town of Boussac, damages were lighters (gardens..)but a blueberries crop and vineyards were damaged.
REFERENCE: ""Un gros orage de grêle fait quelques dégâts dans le secteur de Boussac"", France Bleu Creuse, 11 Aug 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm. Hailstones diameter up to 2 cm (based on photo).
REFERENCE: Météo Centre (on Facebook), 31 Jul 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm in the end of the afternoon or during the night. ""Impressive"" hailstones, damages to roofs, garden crops, vineyards, vehicles.
REFERENCE: ""Gard : la grêle cause d'importants dégâts à Saint-André-de-Roquepertuis"", Midi Libre, 23 Jul 2020.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm. Hailstones diameter up to 3 cm (based on photo)

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm. Hailstones diameter up to 3-4 cm (based on Lyon Capitale). Streets are flooded.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hail on the south of Lyon. Roads partially flooded. The A7 highway traffic had to be stopped. Hailstones diameter up to about 3-4 cm (based on testimony : ""de la taille de balles de ping pong"")

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hail and rainstorm in Oullins. ""Plusieurs cm de petits grêlons"" (based on LCI article). No damage known directly from hail.
REFERENCE: [No title], LCI, 01 Jul 2020. (no free access to video)

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailstorm during the night between 26 and 27. Hailstones diameter up to 5 maybe more (based on paper testimonies ""gros comme des balles de tennis"").

Strong hailstorm  in the evening. Hailstones's diameter between 3 and 4 cm

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Severe thunderstorm with hailstones around 3 to 5 cm have been reported at Lafrançaise (Tarn-et-Garonne) in the first part of the night, causing some damage locally.
Heavy rain with wind and hail during 15 minutes (based on papers). Rain and hailstones caused severe damages in a farm by flooding. Hailstones layer reach several centimeters high in some places.
Big hailstorm caused floodings and other damages in Neuville-sur-Sarthe. the water rose more than 2 m in a cellar. The hailstones were bigger than 1 € coins (min 2 cm diameter). Two trees fell.
RN 10 submerged for a long time by a thick layer of hailstones and partly flooded for nearly a kilometer.
Large hail from a right moving storm near Jura. Diameter estimated from photo. Time based on radar.
Severe hailstorm hit La Chaumusse near Saint-Laurent-en-Grandveaux (Jura), with huge amount of hailstones.
Big hailstorm with hailstone 3 to 5 cm diameter (see photo on firt link)
Impressive hailstorm with brief strong winds. Hailstones diameter and hail layer height several cm. Branches torn off. A garden table is pierced. Other damages very probable but not visible here.
REFERENCE: Gérard Piconnet (on Youtube), 28 May 2018.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Big hail and rainstorm in the beginning of the afternoon. The greenhouses of the city have exploded under the impact of hail.
hailstorm; large hail 3cm i.d.; photo;  source: UWA Wettermelder (v. Facebook), 27 MAY 2018; RAD;
Big hailstorm in Jonzac in the afternoon. Hail layer is at least 2 cm high

Big hailstorm hit Salignac-sur-Charente. Layers of hail on the ground (see coms)
large hailstones about 3 cm diameter fell in the vineyards
The hailstorm ravaged vineyards, crops, and caused damage to homes and cars. The hamlet of Averton is among the most affected.
Strong hailstorm with strong winds. Hailstones diameter up to 3-4 cm (based on vidéo). Branches and leaves torn off, garden furnitures damaged
REFERENCE: Virgidams (on Youtube), 26 May 2018

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Severe damage due to hail in Jonzac area. Garden furniture was completely pierced ""like lace"" by the hailstones, pipes on the roofs are punctured, and the roof of a car is totally dented. Photos suggests hail layer at least 2 cm thick. vineyards are sometimes destroyed at 100% in Jonzac area.
REFERENCE: Charente & Charente-Maritime : un violent orage de grêle frappe le vignoble, francebleu.fr, 27 May 2018.

EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Big hailstorm on Bourg (Bourg sur Gironde) with hailstone 2 to 3 cm diameter (see coms)
Very big hailstorm in Bordeaux. The streets are flooded and hail covered. Damage on the vines
Hailstones 1 to 2 cm diameter on Ludon (Médoc) and white layer of hail. (first link : see coms and photos Loic Arbraz)

a likely supercell hit Lapalisse (Allier) in the afternoon with big hailstones. It was strong and caused damages, mostly on the vegetation with strong windgusts. Big hailstones and thick hail layers on the streets. Strong winds damaged trees too.
Big hailstorm in Angers
Big hailstorm in Pommiers-Moulons.
Big hailstorm in Limoges in the early afternoon. Hailstones were small but the ground were covered with white layer. No damage reported.

Big hailstorm on Paris flooded some streets and subway stations. Streets were covered with a white layer of hail. The basement of the 17th arrondissement town hall was flooded. Large leaks were also visible on the roof of the Tribunal d'Instance.
Big hailstorm in the afternoon with big damage on the vines and 50% of the production of cherries
Big hailstorm, maybe supercellular, in the afternoon in this area. Hailstorms photographied in Biguglia are about 3-4 cm diameter

a violent storm of hail affected Bize-Minervois with hailstones which reached locally 3 cm diameter
a hailstorm hit Montélimar and surrounding area in the middle of the afternoon with hail of good size, probably 3 to 4 cm according to the picture (first link).

In the afternoon Riols is hit by a shower of hail that lasted about 2 hours. Streets are covered with a 5 cm hail layer and some hailstones were about 4 cm large (""big as golf balls""). Data sources : newspapers
At the end of the afternoon, a violent hail and rainstorm stroke Laroquebrou. According to photos, the thickness of the hail layer is at least 2 cm
The streets of Oyé (Saône-et-Loire) were covered by a layer of hail at the end of the afternoon of April 30th.

Vidéo montrant des rues totalement blanchies par l'épaisseur de grêle. Pas de mesures précises.

DETAILED_LOCATION: Commune de Thuir et ses environs
EVENT_DESCRIPTION: LE 6 mars en fin d'après-midi, des chutes de grêle importantes affectent les Pyrénées-Orientales notamment sa partie nord. Sur la région de Thuir, on a ramassé des grêlons de plus de 3 cm (""taille d'une balle de ping pong"" mentionne L'Indépendant avec un cliché qui en atteste).

Une violente chute de grêle a blanchi les toits de Port-Saint-Louis-du-Rhône tôt le matin du 2 mars vers 7-8h. Les photos sont prises en cours d'épisode, et donc la couche n'y figure pas à son niveau maximal.

La page FB Météo Nord-Pas-de-Calais mentionne pour cette date et ce secteur une ""belle averse de grêle"". sur la photo la taille des grêlons semble avoisiner les 2-3 cm mais peu de repères visuels pour en être sûr. Les commentaires mentionnent de nombreux orages de grêle sur la région.

Dans la nuit du 5 au 6 février, une ligne orageuse se forme et circule sur les régions littorales du Languedoc-Roussillon notamment les régions de Béziers, Montpellier... donnant de gros cumuls sur plusieurs heures. Pas davantage de détails sur cette chute de grêle locale, mais la photo montre une couche relativement épaisse de grêlons

En soirée du 1er février, un orage fortement grêligène a circulé de Sainte-Catherine à Garat (8 kms environ au SE d'Angoulême). D'après les photos, les grêlons avaient un diamètre de 0,5 à 1 cm. Pas de dégâts mentionnés. L'averse aurait duré au minimum 30 minutes, de 17h40 à 18h10 environ.

Lors d'un épisode méditerranéen la ville de Draguignan subit de très grosses chutes de grêle. Inondations de locaux, routes endommagées, rues blanchies de grêle. A l'école maternelle Jacques Brel, les faux plafonds se sont effondrés.

Lors d'un épisode méditerranéen la localité de La Motte subit de très grosses chutes de grêle. L'épisode aurait duré 1/4 d'heure et aurait été ""d'une rare puissance"" selon l'auteur de la photo figurant dans l'article. Cette dernière montre une épaisse couche de grêlons de taille plutôt modeste (a priori 1 cm ou moins).  Cliché Hervé Badet dans Var-Matin.

Chute de grêle importante à Maureillas dans la matinée sous les cellules qui ont donné une tornade ce même jour. Une photo de gros grêlons (+ agglomérats) a été postée sur l'article. Taille difficile à évaluer faute de repères précis mais probablement 2-3 cm

Sous la puissante cellule responsable de la tornade de Maureillas (Pyrénées-Orientales), le secteur de Ceret subit de fortes chutes de grêle. Sur l'article, nombreuses photos de grêlons de diamètre entre 1 et 3 cm. Sur le dernier lien, ils avoisinent 4 cms.
We reported some accumulation of small / large hail with a maximum diameter of 2 cm at the passage of the cold front associated with the storm 'Carmen' at Saint-Varent (Deux-Sèvres, Poitou).
Large hail was reported in early morning at the passage of the cold front associated with the storm 'Carmen' at Brasparts (French Brittany)
